Title: Requires a lethality assessment in incidents of domestic violence
Summary: Requires law enforcement officers to conduct a lethality assessment as part of the standardized domestic incident report form when responding to incidents of domestic violence.
LawCode: Amd §§646, 837, 214-b & 840, Exec L; amd §654-a, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law and the general business law, in relation to requiring a lethality assessment in incidents of domestic violence
